title: Black + Decker 12-Speed Fusion Blade Blender
description:
The new Black & Decker FusionBlade Blender combines advanced blade technology with innovative jar geometry to provide a powerful system that's perfect for all of your blending needs. From mixing and chopping to blending and pureeing, the new Black & Decker FusionBlade blender can get the job done quickly and efficiently. Featuring 12 speeds, a large six-cup glass blending jar and a robust motor, this blender is versatile enough for all of your odd jobs. It is strong enough to create a powerful vortex for perfect results every time!

FusionBlade: 2 tip stainless steel blades to shred ice into snow and puree foods fast
12 speeds and pulse for all blending needs
6-cup glass jar with easy to read level markings, ergonomic handle and an easy-to-remove lid
1 oz measuring cup lid insert for easy mixed drinks
Dishwasher safe removable parts
2-year limited warranty

transcripts: Black + Decker new ideas in kitchen science. The Black + Decker 12 speed fusion blade blender provides power and performance. A stainless steel fusion blade crushes, blends and provides for a lasting life span. 12 speeds with pulse allow you to chop, crush, blend and puree your favorite recipes and the 48 ounce perfect pour a glass jar ensures no mess plus the individual parts are dishwasher safe for an easy clean up. The Black + Decker 12 speed fusion blade blender lets your creativity commence in the kitchen.
